speaker: Verso
line: Alicia, I beg you, stop him from painting.

speaker: Maelle
line: Don’t say that, please, don’t say that.

speaker: Verso
line: Hey, please, listen to me. Only you can do this. You can do this, please. Unpaint me. Unpaint me!

speaker: Verso
line: Please. I don’t want this life.

speaker: Verso
line: I don’t want this life… I don’t want this life…

speaker: Maelle
line: I just– I just wanted to live this lifetime together. This lifetime that was stolen from us. Please, brother… Please.

speaker: Verso
line: I don’t want this life… Help me… help me…

speaker: Maelle
line: If you could grow old… would you… find a reason to smile?
